topics.title: Present Perfect
topics.description: Learn how to use the present perfect tense for life experiences and actions.

topics.title: Past Continuous
topics.description: Understand how to describe actions in progress in the past.

topics.title: Going to vs Will
topics.description: Learn the difference between 'going to' and 'will' for future actions.

topics.title: Comparatives and Superlatives
topics.description: Compare people, places, and things correctly.

topics.title: Modals: Must / Have to / Should
topics.description: Talk about obligation, advice and necessity.

topics.title: First Conditional
topics.description: Learn how to talk about real future possibilities.

topics.title: Question Tags
topics.description: Practice using short questions at the end of sentences.

topics.title: Too / Enough
topics.description: Use 'too' and 'enough' to describe quantity and sufficiency.

topics.title: Adverbs of Frequency and Manner
topics.description: Use adverbs to describe how and how often things happen.

topics.title: Gerunds and Infinitives
topics.description: Learn when to use -ing or to + verb.

topics.title: Countable and Uncountable Nouns
topics.description: Distinguish between countable and uncountable nouns.

topics.title: Reflexive Pronouns
topics.description: Learn how to use myself, yourself, etc. correctly.

topics.title: Zero Conditional
topics.description: Talk about general truths and facts.
